summary: An ordinary high school student discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree when he finds himself turning into a werewolf.
cast: Michael J. Fox|James Hampton|Susan Ursitti|Jerry Levine|Matt Adler|Lorie Griffin|James MacKrell|Mark Arnold|Jay Tarses|Mark Holton|Scott Paulin|Elizabeth Gorcey|Melanie Manos|Doug Savant|Charles Zucker|Harvey Vernon|Clare Peck|Gregory Itzin|Doris Hess|Troy Evans|Lynda Wiesmeier|Rodney Kageyama|Carl Steven|Richard Brooks|Richard Domeier|Brian Sheehan|Jay Footlik|Richard Baker|Fred Nelson|Tanna Herr|Kris Hagerty|Mark L. Flowers|Larry B. Daugherty|Tamara Carrera|Cort McCown|Douglas M. Nelson|Erika Pearson|Michael Joseph Pierce|Mikul Robins
title: Teen Wolf (De pelo en pecho)
